participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Liam is hardworking and passionate about music, often finding inspiration in the rhythms of rock while he tends to the fields.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is introspective and resilient, navigating the challenges of single parenthood while pursuing his passion for music.
participant_2.background: whats up i'm a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i prefer being inside. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio.

content.text: rock   i listen to it while i work with my father in the fields
